channel.title: Closed
channel.description: Closed due to many off topic subjects

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

don’t forget Maya frell. And as i have said multiple times: this is not realy modelling the polygon count is so low its almost 2D(that’s not a fact, its a jibe.) If you want real modelling you want the professional programs and the professional techniques go look at the grahics board over in MiTB. As long as you don’t post retarded shit there you will get accepted, however go there and make an enemy of yourself and you will likely be shot down. Go there and learn. Thank you and good night moparscape.
P.S.: Anyone who has a comment please do keep it to yourselves or feel free to send it to; PO BOX I don’t give a shit, London etc etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:47, topic:250902”][quote author=Frell link=topic=331048.msg2588584#msg2588584 date=1229640444]

Kinda, i didn’t know that.

Its used alot on moparscape, im surprised you didn’t :rolleyes:
[/quote]Douchebag[/quote]
Here we go with misunderstanding. This is a moparscape community, a community that PROGRAMS SERVERS… > and * are so commonly used its not even funny.

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:46, topic:250902”][quote author=Frell link=topic=331048.msg2588557#msg2588557 date=1229639574]

Aww.
I don’t like arguing.

Frell, btw, how long have you been modelling?

Not to start anything, but you were part of the arguement, LOL.

He started it.

He mocked me rofl.

Yea, if ANYONE is a judge, CJ should be. Or it’s pointless since he is basically one of the finest modellers on here.

Because thats real logic ‘Oh, he can draw sword splines and add faces so he is best’.

I have been modeling for 2 years btw.

I mocked everyone pretty much. You guys are decent at making appealing stuff, but if anyone had common since and wanted nice models no one would come here for them.

[/quote]

Well, i’ve been modelling 3 months.
And i think my Gibson SG is nearly of the standard of some of the guitars in guitar hero (for example), they can’t be that bad…
And besides, it doesn’t help when half of the community try to influence me to model “RS” models, but i find them boring, and often don’t look good.
Anyway, i’m done with arguing, let there be peace :D[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Start doing some real work in C4D or Max, or anything you can find. But make them look decent at least, then post them in the graphic section and many people will help you, including me, archer, and Somethingtohide.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:29, topic:250902”]@frell, you use a different program then all the modellers here.
Which Most of the modellers here use is called Metasequoia and SilentCJ is the best modeller in this community with that program.
Maybe you use a different program that doesn’t means that you’re better dude.
SilentCJ puts allot of effort into his models, and almost everyone in this community likes his models.
Don’t disagree because you know it’s true.
Don’t think you’re a better modeller then SilentCJ because you use a different Program.
-Assassins Creed Fan.

Edit; And also, difference of age doesn’t means you can be better.
It’s the difference of experience into modelling that you need to be actually better then a person[/quote]
Modeling isn’t about different software. Its about the feel of reality. Using professional software does not make me any different, i just went searching for good software that stands up for what i need, and that is realistic and accurate scenes:

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:24, topic:250902”][quote author=Frell link=topic=331048.msg2587629#msg2587629 date=1229601628]

Yea, if ANYONE is a judge, CJ should be. Or it’s pointless since he is basically one of the finest modellers on here.

Because thats real logic ‘Oh, he can draw sword splines and add faces so he is best’.
[/quote]

Who said i do sword splines?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I can make any model in any detail if i want whatever it is. If i stick to it.
But i often get bored and go and play on my drum kit or something.

And anyways, you use a different program. I use a crappy freeware version of metasequoia.
Whereas C4D is probably much easier to use etc.

You try making my kind of shit on metasequoia.
Then lets see who’s best.[/quote]
Wow… You think your better because you use crappy freeware shit because of choice? No. If you really wanted C4D then you can easily torrent it. Hats, guitars, and low poly skateboards are nothing. Besides, You dont try to make anything look real. You go for moparscapers satisfaction, which isnt much, ill show you.

her guis i recolord this so um ye dl plz
WOW NICE MAN ++

Besides, your probably nine and when you grow up and ditch this place you wont ever model again. I am going to college for this as it beats programming by a good mile for me.

i has cn mdl gutar to
